PL: Aston Villa v Arsenal
programme.desc: Mikel Arteta's Arsenal aim to extend their lead at the top of the Premier League table as they travel to face Unai Emery's in-form Aston Villa at Villa Park.

programme.title: Serie A: Inter v Como
programme.desc: Action from Serie A as Cristian Chivu's Inter welcome Cesc Fabregas' Como to San Siro. Can Inter end Como's impressive 11-game unbeaten run in the league?

programme.title: The Ashes: 2nd Test - Day 3
programme.desc: Highlights from day three of the second Ashes Test at the Gabba in Brisbane, where Ben Stokes' England endured a torrid time with both bat and ball.

programme.title: Live The Ashes: 2nd Test - Day 4
programme.desc: Action from the Gabba as England face a daunting uphill battle to claw their way back into this second Ashes Test and avoid slipping 2-0 down in the series.

programme.title: Live FA Cup: Slough Town v Macclesfield Town
programme.desc: ...Macclesfield FC. Action from the second round of the Emirates FA Cup as sixth-tier side Slough Town host John Rooney's Macclesfield FC at Arbour Park.

programme.title: Live FA Cup: Gateshead v Walsall
programme.desc: Action from the second round of the Emirates FA Cup as National League side Gateshead meet Mat Sadler's high-flying League Two Saddlers at Gateshead International Stadium.

programme.title: Live FA Cup: Blackpool v Carlisle
programme.desc: Action from the Emirates FA Cup second-round clash between Ian Evatt's Blackpool and Mark Hughes' National League side Carlisle United at Bloomfield Road.

programme.title: Live Serie A: Napoli v Juventus
programme.desc: Juventus look to continue their unbeaten start to life under Luciano Spalletti as they face his former side Napoli at the Stadio Diego Armando Maradona.

programme.title: UFC 323 - Dvalishvili vs Yan 2
programme.desc: Action from UFC 323 at the T-Mobile Arena in Paradise, Nevada, featuring the UFC bantamweight title bout between current champion Merab Dvalishvili and Petr Yan.

programme.title: UFC Connected
programme.desc: Inside Montreal's iconic Tristar Gym, we explore how the Zahabi brothers forged an unbreakable bond. And, Zhang Weili reflects on becoming the first-ever Chinese-born UFC champion.

programme.title: TNT Sports Reload
programme.desc: The best bits from TNT Sports over the last week, including exclusive interviews, top action, and more.

programme.title: Kenny Allstar's Number 1's
programme.desc: Kenny Allstar meets Aston Villa and England midfield maestro Morgan Rogers to chat about the Champions League, Cristiano Ronaldo, Marcus Rashford and more.

programme.title: TNT Sports Cricket Reload
programme.desc: Relive the best batting action from the first Ashes Test between Australia and England at Optus Stadium, featuring a match-winning century by Travis Head.

programme.title: TNT Sports Cricket Reload
programme.desc: We look back at the best bowling action from the first Ashes Test between Australia and England at Optus Stadium, where Mitchell Starc took ten wickets for the hosts.

programme.desc: Action from the Gabba as England face a daunting uphill battle to claw their way back into this second Ashes Test and avoid slipping 2-0 down in the series.

programme.title: Live The Ashes: 2nd Test - Day 5
programme.desc: Day five of the second Ashes Test between Australia and England at the Gabba in Brisbane.

programme.desc: We look back at the best bowling action from the first Ashes Test between Australia and England at Optus Stadium, where Mitchell Starc took ten wickets for the hosts.

programme.desc: Relive the best batting action from the first Ashes Test between Australia and England at Optus Stadium, featuring a match-winning century by Travis Head.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Magazine
programme.desc: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang reflects on the personal and professional journey that has led him to Marseille. Plus, we speak to PSG star Joao Neves and Inter manager Cristian Chivu.

programme.title: Gloucester-Hartpury Women's v...
programme.desc: ...Ealing Trailfinders Women. Gloucester-Hartpury look to continue their perfect start to the Premiership Women's Rugby season as they face Ealing Trailfinders at Kingsholm.

programme.title: India v South Africa - 3rd ODI
programme.desc: Action from the third One Day International between India and South Africa at ACA-VDCA Cricket Stadium. Who will hold their nerve in this series-decider?

programme.title: The Ashes: 2nd Test - Day 5
programme.desc: Day five of the second Ashes Test between Australia and England at the Gabba in Brisbane.

programme.title: The Big Interview: Gianfranco Zola
programme.desc: Legendary Chelsea midfielder Gianfranco Zola discusses his childhood, learning his trade under Diego Maradona at Napoli, and his glittering Premier League career.

programme.title: PL Stories: Gary Neville
programme.desc: From Class of '92 prodigy to Premier League Hall of Fame icon, legendary right-back Gary Neville talks us through the moments that defined his legacy at Manchester United.

programme.title: ESPN DOC
programme.desc: Op 25 november 2025 is het precies vijf jaar geleden dat Diego Armando Maradona overleed. De Argentijn loodste zijn land in 1986 eigenhandig naar de wereldtitel en nam eind jaren '80 het toen nog kleine Napoli bij de hand op weg naar twee Italiaanse landstitels. In 'Op zoek naar Maradona' ontmoet AD-journalist Sjoerd Mossou - schrijver van het gelijknamige boek - verschillende mensen op wie Maradona grote indruk maakte.

programme.title: Dossier Eredivisie
programme.desc: In Dossier Eredivisie komen de mooiste momenten van de rijke historie van de leukste competitie ter wereld voorbij. In de tweede aflevering staat de keeper centraal. Zijn keepers echt een beetje gek? Met hulp van o.a. oud-keeper Henk Timmer, Eredivisie-veteranen Bryan Linssen en Jens Toornstra én keeperspecialist Frans Hoek gaat Wouter op zoek naar antwoorden.

programme.title: ESPN DOC
programme.desc: Op 25 november 2025 is het precies vijf jaar geleden dat Diego Armando Maradona overleed. De Argentijn loodste zijn land in 1986 eigenhandig naar de wereldtitel en nam eind jaren '80 het toen nog kleine Napoli bij de hand op weg naar twee Italiaanse landstitels. In 'Op zoek naar Maradona' ontmoet AD-journalist Sjoerd Mossou - schrijver van het gelijknamige boek - verschillende mensen op wie Maradona grote indruk maakte.

programme.title: Voetbal Geeft
programme.desc: Paul (59) gaat gebukt onder eenzaamheid. Via het project Voetbalmaatjes bij AZ wordt hij gekoppeld aan Erik, met wie hij naar elke thuiswedstrijd van AZ gaat. Er groeit een vriendschap op en het helpt Paul uit zijn isolement. Nu mogen ze tijdens een wedstrijd van AZ de bal naar de middenstip brengen en de toss verrichten.

programme.title: Dossier Eredivisie
programme.desc: In Dossier Eredivisie komen de mooiste momenten van de rijke historie van de leukste competitie ter wereld voorbij. In de tweede aflevering staat de keeper centraal. Zijn keepers echt een beetje gek? Met hulp van o.a. oud-keeper Henk Timmer, Eredivisie-veteranen Bryan Linssen en Jens Toornstra én keeperspecialist Frans Hoek gaat Wouter op zoek naar antwoorden.

programme.title: ESPN DOC
programme.desc: Op 25 november 2025 is het precies vijf jaar geleden dat Diego Armando Maradona overleed. De Argentijn loodste zijn land in 1986 eigenhandig naar de wereldtitel en nam eind jaren '80 het toen nog kleine Napoli bij de hand op weg naar twee Italiaanse landstitels. In 'Op zoek naar Maradona' ontmoet AD-journalist Sjoerd Mossou - schrijver van het gelijknamige boek - verschillende mensen op wie Maradona grote indruk maakte.

programme.title: Dossier Eredivisie
programme.desc: In Dossier Eredivisie komen de mooiste momenten van de rijke historie van de leukste competitie ter wereld voorbij. In de tweede aflevering staat de keeper centraal. Zijn keepers echt een beetje gek? Met hulp van o.a. oud-keeper Henk Timmer, Eredivisie-veteranen Bryan Linssen en Jens Toornstra én keeperspecialist Frans Hoek gaat Wouter op zoek naar antwoorden.

programme.title: ESPN DOC
programme.desc: Op 25 november 2025 is het precies vijf jaar geleden dat Diego Armando Maradona overleed. De Argentijn loodste zijn land in 1986 eigenhandig naar de wereldtitel en nam eind jaren '80 het toen nog kleine Napoli bij de hand op weg naar twee Italiaanse landstitels. In 'Op zoek naar Maradona' ontmoet AD-journalist Sjoerd Mossou - schrijver van het gelijknamige boek - verschillende mensen op wie Maradona grote indruk maakte.

programme.title: ESPN DOC
programme.desc: Op 25 november 2025 is het precies vijf jaar geleden dat Diego Armando Maradona overleed. De Argentijn loodste zijn land in 1986 eigenhandig naar de wereldtitel en nam eind jaren '80 het toen nog kleine Napoli bij de hand op weg naar twee Italiaanse landstitels. In 'Op zoek naar Maradona' ontmoet AD-journalist Sjoerd Mossou - schrijver van het gelijknamige boek - verschillende mensen op wie Maradona grote indruk maakte.

programme.desc: In Dossier Eredivisie komen de mooiste momenten van de rijke historie van de leukste competitie ter wereld voorbij. In de tweede aflevering staat de keeper centraal. Zijn keepers echt een beetje gek? Met hulp van o.a. oud-keeper Henk Timmer, Eredivisie-veteranen Bryan Linssen en Jens Toornstra én keeperspecialist Frans Hoek gaat Wouter op zoek naar antwoorden.

programme.title: Voetbal Geeft
programme.desc: Paul (59) gaat gebukt onder eenzaamheid. Via het project Voetbalmaatjes bij AZ wordt hij gekoppeld aan Erik, met wie hij naar elke thuiswedstrijd van AZ gaat. Er groeit een vriendschap op en het helpt Paul uit zijn isolement. Nu mogen ze tijdens een wedstrijd van AZ de bal naar de middenstip brengen en de toss verrichten.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: Clinching the fifth of her eight Miami Open titles, Serena Williams would have to overcome one of her great rivals Justine Henin as the pair met in a highly anticipated 2007 final.

programme.title: Best of the US Open 2025
programme.desc: With the weight of Wimbledon final defeat lifted, Amanda Anisimova enters a last-four clash with the two-time US Open champion Naomi Osaka - her first Grand Slam semi since 2021.

programme.title: Best of the US Open 2025
programme.desc: In the fourth round of the women's singles at the 2025 US Open, Taylor Townsend's dream New York run saw the American take on two-time Grand Slam champion Barbora Krejcikova.

programme.title: WTA Indian Wells 2025 Review
programme.desc: A review of the 2025 BNP Paribas Open, a WTA 1000 event held in Indian Wells in the United States.

programme.title: WTA Miami 2025 Review
programme.desc: A review of the 2025 Miami Open, a WTA 1000 event.

programme.title: ATP Madrid 2025 Review
programme.desc: A review of the 2025 Madrid Open, an ATP Masters 1000 clay-court event held in the Spanish capital.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: In a battle of generations, two of the all-time greats Roger Federer and Andre Agassi fought for the year-end championship in 2003. Federer was aiming for his first title on American soil.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: Meeting for the first time in a final at tour level, the Williams sisters Venus and Serena went toe to toe in an emotionally charged contest for the Miami Open title.

programme.title: WTA Final: Rome
programme.desc: A women's singles champion is crowned at the Italian Open, as home favourite and world number five Jasmine Paolini faces the American Coco Gauff. (17.05)

programme.title: WTA Final: Adelaide
programme.desc: In an all-American final at the Adelaide International, Jessica Pegula and Madison Keys contest the third instalment of their rivalry, with the head-to-head record at one apiece. (11.01)

programme.title: WTA Final: Austin
programme.desc: A women's singles champion is crowned in the final of the ATX Open, a WTA Tour 250 event held in Austin, Texas. (02.03)

programme.title: ATP Final: Stuttgart
programme.desc: In a blockbuster Stuttgart final, world number three Alexander Zverev competes for a maiden grass-court title against second seed Taylor Fritz, who leads the head to head 7-5. (15.06)

programme.title: ATP Final: Adelaide
programme.desc: Number two seed Sebastian Korda of America stands between Felix Auger-Aliassime and a sixth tour-level title for the Canadian, as the two clash in the Adelaide International final. (11.01)

programme.title: ATP Final: Montpellier
programme.desc: In his 17th career final and second of 2025, Felix Auger-Aliassime takes on American qualifier Aleksandar Kovacevic, who stunned top seed Andrey Rublev, for the Montpellier crown. (02.02)

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: In their first ever match in what would become a trophy-laden rivalry, Roger Federer - the then world number one - encountered Rafael Nadal in the third round of the 2004 Miami Open.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: In the match that resulted in Serena Williams' 14-year boycott of Indian Wells, the then 19-year-old fought Kim Clijsters in front of a volatile crowd - ultimately clinching her second titl

programme.title: WTA Final: Madrid
programme.desc: In a repeat of the 2023 US Open final, two-time Madrid champion Aryna Sabalenka eyes another marquee title against Coco Gauff, who won their only prior clay-court meeting. (03.05)

programme.title: ATP Final: Paris
programme.desc: A year-end champion is crowned in the French capital at the Rolex Paris Masters. (02.11)

programme.title: WTA Final: Beijing
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights as a women's singles champion is crowned in the final of the China Open - a WTA 1000 event. (05.10)

programme.title: New: Journey To Jeddah
programme.desc: On the road to the season-ending Next Gen ATP Finals, take a unique look into the lives of up-and-coming stars on the ATP Tour.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: In a five-hour, five-set Rome Open epic, an 18-year-old Rafael Nadal lit up the Foro Italico in his back-and-forth contest with Argentina's Guillermo Coria.

programme.title: WTA Final: Rome
programme.desc: A women's singles champion is crowned at the Italian Open, as home favourite and world number five Jasmine Paolini faces the American Coco Gauff. (17.05)

programme.title: WTA Final: Adelaide
programme.desc: In an all-American final at the Adelaide International, Jessica Pegula and Madison Keys contest the third instalment of their rivalry, with the head-to-head record at one apiece. (11.01)

programme.title: WTA Final: Austin
programme.desc: A women's singles champion is crowned in the final of the ATX Open, a WTA Tour 250 event held in Austin, Texas. (02.03)

programme.title: ATP Final: Washington
programme.desc: Into his second final of 2025, Australian world number 13 Alex de Minaur meets Spaniard Alejandro Davidovich Fokina. De Minaur fell short in the Washington final back in 2018. (27.07)

programme.title: ATP Final: Stuttgart
programme.desc: In a blockbuster Stuttgart final, world number three Alexander Zverev competes for a maiden grass-court title against second seed Taylor Fritz, who leads the head to head 7-5. (15.06)

programme.title: ATP Final: Adelaide
programme.desc: Number two seed Sebastian Korda of America stands between Felix Auger-Aliassime and a sixth tour-level title for the Canadian, as the two clash in the Adelaide International final. (11.01)

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: In pursuit of the first of her three Toronto titles, Serena Williams came across serial winner Monica Seles, a four-time winner in her own right, in the 2001 semi-finals.

programme.title: ATP Final: Rome
programme.desc: World number one Jannik Sinner takes on soon-to-be world number two Carlos Alcaraz in a blockbuster Italian Open final. Between them, the pair have won the last five majors. (18.05)

programme.title: Ultimate Tennis Showdown Final
programme.desc: The 2025 London Grand Final from the Ultimate Tennis Showdown reaches its finale. (07.12)

programme.title: ATP Final: Shanghai
programme.desc: It's a family affair in Shanghai as cousins Valentin Vacherot and Arthur Rinderknech vie for the penultimate Masters 1000 title of 2025. Vacherot stunned Djokovic to get here. (12.10)

programme.title: WTA All Access Magazine
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes with an all-access look at the stars of the WTA Tour as they compete at premier events throughout the season.

programme.title: Tennis 2025 Season Review
programme.desc: With both the WTA and ATP Finals in the history books, enjoy a full review of the 2025 season.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: In a rematch of the 2023 Madrid Open final, world number one Iga Swiatek and defending champion Aryna Sabalenka meet again to determine this year's women's singles champion.

programme.title: WTA Final: Linz
programme.desc: Dayana Yastremska ends a near three-year wait to compete for a WTA title, as the Ukrainian faces the number four seed Ekaterina Alexandrova in the Upper Austria Ladies Linz final. (02.02)

programme.title: WTA Final: Dubai
programme.desc: A women's singles champion is crowned in Dubai. Russia's Mirra Andreeva - the youngest-ever WTA finalist - and Denmark's Clara Tauson face off for glory. (22.02)

programme.title: WTA Final: Indian Wells
programme.desc: Mirra Andreeva meets top seed Aryna Sabalenka in the Indian Wells final. Sabalenka avenged her Australian Open defeat to Keys in the semis, while Andreeva dethroned Swiatek. (16.03)

programme.title: ATP Final: Indian Wells
programme.desc: Britain's Jack Draper competes in his maiden ATP Masters 1000 final at Indian Wells as the top-10 bound Brit faces Holger Rune. Draper knocked out Carlos Alcaraz in the last four. (16.03)

programme.title: ATP Final: Toronto
programme.desc: Ben Shelton features in his first ATP Masters final as the 22-year-old eyes world number six status against Karen Khachanov, who ends a seven-year wait to compete on this stage. (07.08)

programme.title: ATP Final: Washington
programme.desc: Into his second final of 2025, Australian world number 13 Alex de Minaur meets Spaniard Alejandro Davidovich Fokina. De Minaur fell short in the Washington final back in 2018. (27.07)

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: Andre Agassi and Pete Sampras met in the 2001 Indian Wells final - one of 34 career meetings. Agassi eyed a second consecutive win over Sampras in their first meeting in over a year.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: In the 1996 Indian Wells final, Steffi Graf - having made her competitive return after a four-month injury layoff - would compete with Spain's Conchita Martinez for the title.

programme.desc: Step behind the scenes of men's professional tennis throughout the 2025 season on the ATP Tour with special features, interviews and much more.

programme.desc: Clinching the fifth of her eight Miami Open titles, Serena Williams would have to overcome one of her great rivals Justine Henin as the pair met in a highly anticipated 2007 final.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: Saving four match points in the process, Roger Federer was pushed to the limit in his 2014 ATP Finals semi-final meeting with fellow Swiss superstar Stan Wawrinka.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: In a three-hour test of wills, Justine Henin was bidding to close an up-and-down year with the defence of her WTA Finals title against Maria Sharapova in 2007.

programme.title: ATP Final: Indian Wells
programme.desc: Britain's Jack Draper competes in his maiden ATP Masters 1000 final at Indian Wells as the top-10 bound Brit faces Holger Rune. Draper knocked out Carlos Alcaraz in the last four. (16.03)

programme.title: ATP Tour This Week
programme.desc: Step behind the scenes of men's professional tennis throughout the 2025 season on the ATP Tour with special features, interviews and much more.

programme.title: UTS Highlights
programme.desc: On Super Saturday at the UTS Grand Final, eight round-robin matches across two sessions sees Alex de Minaur, Andrey Rublev, Casper Ruud and more target Sunday's Copper Box finale. (06.12)

programme.title: UTS Highlights
programme.desc: On Super Saturday at the UTS Grand Final, eight round-robin matches across two sessions sees Alex de Minaur, Andrey Rublev, Casper Ruud and more target Sunday's Copper Box finale. (06.12)

programme.title: Live: Ultimate Tennis Showdown
programme.desc: The 2025 London Grand Final from the Ultimate Tennis Showdown reaches its finale.

programme.title: WTA Final: Madrid
programme.desc: In a repeat of the 2023 US Open final, two-time Madrid champion Aryna Sabalenka eyes another marquee title against Coco Gauff, who won their only prior clay-court meeting. (03.05)

programme.title: ATP Final: Paris
programme.desc: A year-end champion is crowned in the French capital at the Rolex Paris Masters. (02.11)

programme.title: WTA Final: Beijing
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights as a women's singles champion is crowned in the final of the China Open - a WTA 1000 event. (05.10)

programme.title: ATP Final: Shanghai
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights as a men's singles champion is crowned in the final of the Rolex Shanghai Masters. (12.10)

programme.title: WTA Final: Cincinnati
programme.desc: Six-time Grand Slam champion Iga Swiatek faces Jasmine Paolini for the Cincinnati title. In what will be Swiatek's 13th WTA 1000 final, Paolini is competing in just her third. (18.08)

programme.title: ATP Season Review Show 2025
programme.desc: A full breakdown and review of the 2025 season on the men's tour.

programme.title: WTA All Access Magazine
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes with an all-access look at the stars of the WTA Tour as they compete at premier events throughout the season.

programme.title: Ultimate Tennis Showdown Final
programme.desc: The 2025 London Grand Final from the Ultimate Tennis Showdown reaches its finale. (07.12)

programme.title: ATP Final: Doha
programme.desc: In Doha, Great Britain's Jack Draper - entering his fifth ATP final - comes up against fifth seed and 2020 tournament champion Andrey Rublev in the final of the 2025 Qatar Open. (22.02)

programme.title: WTA Final: Dubai
programme.desc: A women's singles champion is crowned in Dubai. Mirra Andreeva - the youngest-ever WTA finalist - and Denmark's Clara Tauson face off for glory. (22.02)

programme.title: WTA Final: Indian Wells
programme.desc: Mirra Andreeva meets top seed Aryna Sabalenka in the Indian Wells final. Sabalenka avenged her Australian Open defeat to Keys in the semis, while Andreeva dethroned Swiatek. (16.03)
